title: What the Heck Happened to Mobile Gaming? | Extra Punctuation
description:
This week on Extra Punctuation, Yahtzee discusses how indie hit Unpacking was mercilessly ripped off and cloned and how it is reflective of larger, horrendous trends in the mobile gaming sphere.

title: Why Is Difficulty in Video Games Such a Contentious Topic? | Breakout
description:
This week on Breakout we candidly discuss our thoughts on difficulty in video games and how it relates to Sifu.

Featuring Nick Calandra, Marty Sliva and KC Nwosu, the freeform podcast dives into a bit of our daily lives, the latest games, movies, tv shows and books, the occasional craft beer review and random topics we find interesting.

New episodes every Wednesday morning from 9 AM to 10:00 AM CT.
